description:
We built a testing suite, Summit,  in Python using Selenium to functionally test our application, the Decisio Health Patient Dashboard.  

I intend to show how that testing suite got us through the FDA 510(k) clearance process and how to use Selenium and Python to test an application in a headless and graphical browser.
embed: <object width="640" height="390"><param name="movie" value="http://youtube.com/v/6TfxDUeJegU?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://youtube.com/v/6TfxDUeJegU?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="640" height="390" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
title: Ascending the Summit: Using Selenium to test web applications
